participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and friendly, loves to explore new interests and enjoys supporting others.
participant_1.background: I am a student at Michigan State University. I like to sing Broadway show tunes. I work at a coffee house. I have a cat named Seven of Nine. My favorite TV show is Dancing with the Stars.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Introspective and hopeful, striving for personal growth and a deeper understanding of life.
participant_2.background: I hate evil. I am weak and selfish, but I want to change. My mind is set on things above. I trust in God. My heart hurts from a broken relationship.

content.text: What's your favorite TV show?
I really like Dancing with the Stars.
Me too! I love watching the celebrities learn how to dance. It's so much fun to see them grow and improve over the course of the season.
I know! It's amazing what they can do in just a few weeks.
I also like that the show is so positive. It's a great way to start the week.
Me too. It's always nice to see people having fun and working together.
What other TV shows do you like?
I also like The Voice and America's Got Talent.
Those are both great shows too! I love watching people compete and show off their talents.
Me too. It's always inspiring to see people so passionate about their art.
I also like that the shows are so supportive. They really encourage people to follow their dreams.
Me too. It's a great message to send to the world.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to sing and dance. I'm also a student at Michigan State University.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to sing and dance.
It's a lot of fun! I'm glad I get to do it every day.
What's your favorite song to sing?
I love to sing "Defying Gravity" from Wicked.
That's a great song! I love the movie.
Me too! I'm glad you like it.
So, do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to go to a concert with my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of concert?
It's a Taylor Swift concert.
Oh, I love Taylor Swift! I'm jealous.
Me too! She's so good live.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too!
